descriptionHtml:
The original, vault-tec armor colors were not to my liking, so I decided to change stuff here and there.

Edit: added a pic of the male variant

V.1.1: Added Helmet + Shield

p.s: I\'d suggest using this armor with my other mod: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1625 

Have fun, and please let me know if you have any ideas. :)

2011.11.30. - Added a few pics of my current progress of the HD version, hope you like it so far! ;) ^^

UPDATE: the new HD version can be downloaded here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2122
author: ababuobi
